Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Pali mtengo wa mkuyu ndi mtengo wa azitona
Ndi pali Mzinda uwu wa mtendere
Ndithudi Ife tidamulenga munthu mâ€™chikombole chabwino
Kupatula amene amakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, iwo adzalandira mphotho yosatha
Kodi ndi chiyani, chimene chili kukupangitsani kukana tsiku la chiweruzo
Kodi Mulungu si woweruza wabwino kuposa oweruza onse
